main.name: Grace Popoola
main.bio: I am a full-stack web developer. I build websites and proffer solutions to problems and challenges with creative and intelligent thinking. Do you want to build a professional website? Go through my work and you will be convinced by what you see.
main.contactmessage: To build a professional website, look through some of my work and experiences! If you like what you see and have a project you need to build, donâ€™t hesitate and contact me.

work.title: Mentor
work.description: Improved productivity of junior developers. Provide technical support to web developers through code reviews.

work.title: Technical content writer
work.description: Propose topics to improve student's productivity in a software development program.

projects.title: Resturant Page
projects.category: In this project, I built a Simple Restuarant Page App using webpack to practice DOM manipulation.

projects.title: Book Transaction
projects.category: A book transaction tracker application where users can monitor and share expenses and external expenses amongst groups. Built with Ruby on Rails (rails, ruby)

projects.title: Html and Css
projects.category: This project is built using Html and CSS, Bootstrap CSS framework, flex and grid positioning. Users are allowed to search by venue and location.(html, css, flex, bootstrap)

projects.title: Social Media
projects.category: In this project I developed a full flesh social media application from modelling the entity relationship diagram (ERD) to building the needed ActiveRecords.(rails, ruby)

projects.title: Todo App
projects.category: In this project, I built a simple Todo App using Webpack and ES6 by dynamically creating a majority of the DOM elements. Local storage was used to save the user's session.(JavaScript, css, html, bootstrap)

projects.title: Weather App
projects.category: A weather app built with javascript that pulls from the OpenWeatherMap API. I used the API using Async/Await to work with promises using the fetch function. Users are allowed to search for and view the forecast worldwide and toggle the data in Fahrenheit or Celsius.(JavaScript, css, html)
